Sentence.string: M Blayton might have been poisoned. Do you know by chance people who could have done it?
How d’you want me to know such a thing?
I simply ask, you sell opium so I thought you might be an expert in poisons.
I know a couple of things about it, but nothing more.
In that case, could you tell me where I can find hemlock?

If your guy was poisoned with hemlock and if it’s your only clue, this might take a while for you to catch the murderer! That weed can be found everywhere. But it’s indeed very effective ! Well, this is what some people told me...
Is it possible for you to provide this plant for me?
Are you so indiscreet with every customer Mr. Hurtley?
Fine, i can get you some, as everyone in this town, but if you insist to pay for it… how much do you need ?
Actually I’m not quite sure to want some anymore. I need to think about it.
